Sizing Strike.name: Sizing Strike
Sizing Strike.flavor: Your attack is only probing, but what you see gives you confidence and your enemy pause.
Sizing Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Sizing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain 10 temporary hit points. If you have combat advantage against the target, add your Strength modifier or Charisma modifier (your choice) to the damage roll and to the temporary hit points gained.

Gruesome Kill.name: Gruesome Kill
Gruesome Kill.flavor: You finish off your adversary with efficient butchery, and no other foe wants any part of you.
Gruesome Kill.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Gruesome Kill.effect: Each enemy that can see you takes a â€“2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

Death Dealer Assault.name: Death Dealer Assault
Death Dealer Assault.flavor: The wound you open tags your foe as yours.
Death Dealer Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Death Dealer Assault.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). Until the target saves against this damage, you can shift 1 square toward it as a minor action.
